name: Yacht Dice: Global League
description:
The dice is cast

the people all over the world have been waiting for.
The first league will finally begin.

◇ Play for free.
- Download Yacht Dice M and play it for free.
- If you play the game, you will get a variety of free of charge.

◇ Play alone or together
- earn points from the league and raise your rank.
- Have a 2:2 friendly battle with your friends!

◆ The world's first league opening!
- From iron to champion, get the highest power!
- A breathtaking baby hair battle with chips on it

◆ Your choice to shake the plate
- The genealogy of reversal, "Yacht", is not over until it's over.
- 12 choices, your choice will determine the outcome.

◆ My type, unique characters and dice!
- "Why is Lupin and Chef coming out here?"
- Unique characters are preparing for the league match.
- Compete with more than 20 unique dice!
